summary: SummaryColors that enrich your lips. L'Or√©al's Colour Riche Satin Lipstick comes in luxuriously creamy colors infused with pure, caring ingredients for rich hydration.
details: DetailsFeaturesL'Oreal Paris Presents The Houses of Colour Riche, Four vibrant color families- Reds, Berries, Pinks, NudesColor does not smudge, smear, migrate, or feather, Colour Riche Satin smoothes the lips in just one coatChoose from bold reds, vibrant mauves, bright pinks, and your-lips-but-better nudes, Choose your House, Choose your colorColour Riche Satin, available in multiple shades, Pair with Colour Riche Lip Liner for a complete lip lookBenefitsInfused with 75% caring ingredients like vitamin E & Argan oil, Colour Riche Satin leaves lips feeling soft and moisturizedItem 2117568How To UseApply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips, following the contour of your mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip.IngredientsLanolin Liquida/Lanolin Oil, Oleyl Erucate, Sesamum Indicum Oil/Sesame Seed Oil, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Icrocristalline, Ppg-5 Lanolin Wax, Acetylated Lanolin, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire Dabeille, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Argania Spinosa Oil/Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Silica, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Methyl-2-Octynoate, Tin Oxide, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Acrylates Copolymer. May Contain: Mica, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, CI 77499, CI 77492, CI 77491/Iron Oxides, CI 15850/Red 7, CI 45410/Red 28 Lake, CI 15985/Yellow 6 Lake, CI 77163/Bismuth Oxychloride, CI 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, CI 45380/Red 22 Lake, CI 75470/Carmine, CI 42090/Blue 1 Lake. FIL D33009/13.
how_to_use: Apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips, following the contour of your mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip.
ingredients: Argania Spinosa Oil/Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
